# getAddress()

**Instance Method**

Get the Bluetooth device address for the target device.

## Declaration

```swift
func getAddress() -> UnsafePointer<BluetoothDeviceAddress>!
```

## Return Value

Returns a pointer to the Bluetooth device address of the target device.
title: getAddress()
